channel.title: Messages on Twilio API Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in Messages on Twilio API Explorer

item.title: Send Message
item.description: Send messages with the Twilio Messaging API. SMS console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/params\/send\/sms.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Read, Update, Delete
item.description: Read, Update and Delete messages with the Twilio Messaging API. LIST You may optionally query by To, From and DateSent. Specify a date as YYYY-MM-DD in GMT to read only messages sent on this date, such as DateSent 2022-08-25 . You can also specify an inequality, such as DateSent> YYYY-MM-DD to read messages sent on or after midnight on a date or DateSent> 2022-08-25T22:00:00 to read messages sent on or after a specific time.

item.title: Feedback
item.description: Provide feedback to Twilio on the deliverability of messages through different messaging channels. PROVIDE FEEDABACK Send an SMS for which to provide feedback with ProvideFeedback=true param. console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/params\/feedback\/create.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Test Credentials
item.description: Send messages with test credentials to simulate different responses. This API uses the test credentials and test phone numbers described here. SUCCESS console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/params\/test\/success.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .
